Louis had a very clean house and was quick to respond. There were a few issues that were a problem with our stay. There was no toilet paper in the entire house. Louis said he would send some over, which he did, but we weren't sure how long we could wait, being 5 people that just came off a 16 hour drive, so we went out to buy our own. We only had a few hours to swim before bedtime and leaving the next morning. Unfortunately, going out for the toilet paper took half our swim time. We also couldn't get the hot tub to turn on. We didn't have instructions. We think we understood it, but we kept getting an error message, that when looked up online, meant the filter system needed cleaning or another possible maintenance issue. We didn't message Louis because at this time it was 11PM, so we called it a night. There were also some very small ants in the master bathroom around the toilet seat area. There were no towel racks in the master bathroom, but mounts where they were supposed to be. These were minor things to me since we wanted to swim and only had a few hours there for the one night we stayed. I would probably stay there again since the backyard and porch were nice and relaxing and we needed the yard for the dog. Also, beds were extremely comfortable and check in was super easy. Hopefully, toilet paper will not be an issues again and the hot tub will get cleaned/fixed.
